trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANLOP101_04687_SEQ_00<tab>Managingway seems to be mulling over music.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANLOP101_04687_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with the laboring Loporrit in Greatest Endsvale.
TEXT_BANLOP101_04687_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the requested items to Managingway.
TEXT_BANLOP101_04687_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the laboring Loporrit in Greatest Endsvale.

TEXT_BANLOP101_04687_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E4E8050A ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050B ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80509 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050D ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80510 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANLOP101_04687_MANAGINGWAY_000_000<tab>Considering the success of our musicking station, I do believe its equipment will require extra maintenance.
TEXT_BANLOP101_04687_MANAGINGWAY_000_001<tab>Can you imagine the glum disappointment that awaits us should our music fail to play during peak merriment? I shudder to even consider it.
TEXT_BANLOP101_04687_MANAGINGWAY_000_002<tab>I tasked one of our Ways with preparing spare parts for the audio apparatus. However, that was some time ago, with nary a whisper of their progress since.
TEXT_BANLOP101_04687_MANAGINGWAY_000_003<tab>Could I trouble you to lend them assistance? They are no doubt hard at work in Greatest Endsvale.
TEXT_BANLOP101_04687_LOPORRIT4687_000_010<tab>Have you come to help me? Oh, you are very nice. There are still so many pieces I must make and I've been making them for ever so long...
TEXT_BANLOP101_04687_LOPORRIT4687_000_011<tab>Like these metal parts for our amplifiers. Could you make some of those? I have plenty of supplies here, if you need any more.
TEXT_BANLOP101_04687_LOPORRIT4687_000_012<tab>Like these little parts for our speakers. Could you help with some of those? I have plenty of supplies here, if you need any more.
TEXT_BANLOP101_04687_LOPORRIT4687_000_013<tab>Like these delicate parts for our wiring. Could you make some of those? I have plenty of supplies here, if you need any more.
TEXT_BANLOP101_04687_LOPORRIT4687_000_014<tab>Once you're finished, go on ahead and take them to Managingway. I may be a while yet...
TEXT_BANLOP101_04687_LOPORRIT4687_000_015<tab>Did you run out of supplies? O-Oh, you were joking. Ha ha! ...Funny.
TEXT_BANLOP101_04687_LOPORRIT4687_000_016<tab>Did you run out of supplies? O-Oh, you were joking. Ha ha! ...Funny.
TEXT_BANLOP101_04687_LOPORRIT4687_000_017<tab>Did you run out of supplies? O-Oh, you were joking. Ha ha! ...Funny.
TEXT_BANLOP101_04687_LOPORRIT4687_000_018<tab>Did you run out of supplies? Goodness knows I've plenty to spare...
TEXT_BANLOP101_04687_LOPORRIT4687_000_019<tab>Did you run out of supplies? Goodness knows I've plenty to spare...
TEXT_BANLOP101_04687_LOPORRIT4687_000_020<tab>Did you run out of supplies? Goodness knows I've plenty to spare...
TEXT_BANLOP101_04687_MANAGINGWAY_000_030<tab>How fares our helper? Have they made progress with the spare parts?
TEXT_BANLOP101_04687_MANAGINGWAY_000_031<tab>Marvelous! With these pieces, I daresay our music will be free of malfunction for some time yet.

TEXT_BANLOP101_04687_MANAGINGWAY_000_032<tab>Originally, our audio apparatus was meant to broadcast Burrow-wide announcements for our guests, but as we no longer expect visitors from Etheirys, we repurposed the equipment.

TEXT_BANLOP101_04687_MANAGINGWAY_000_033<tab>Only time will tell if our musicking station's requirements exceed the capabilities of our apparatus...but in the meantime, we shall do our utmost to keep everything in working order.
TEXT_BANLOP101_04687_MANAGINGWAY_000_034<tab>I do hope you will assist us again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Please accept this small token of our appreciation.
